Thank you for registering for the 8th Br: Thank you for registering for the 8th Brazilian Congress on Statistical Modeling in Insurance and Finance (8th BCSMIF)!

How to send proof of payment: How to send proof of payment

8th Brazilian Conference on Statistical: 8th Brazilian Conference on Statistical Modeling in Insurance and Finance
The 8th BCSMIF objective is to provide a: The 8th BCSMIF objective is to provide a forum for presenting cutting-edge research on the development, implementation of recent methods in the field of Finance and Insurance, with emphasize on the practical applications of Data Science and Machine Learning.
Institute of Mathematics and Statistics: Institute of Mathematics and Statistics of the University of São Paulo (IME-USP)
Two satellite workshops will be held bef: Two satellite workshops will be held before 8th BCSMIF
Workshop on Risk Analysis and Applicatio: Workshop on Risk Analysis and Applications (WRAA)
Get detailed information about each work: Get detailed information about each workshop, including topics, speakers, and registration details.
Complete fee information for all events: Complete fee information for all events and participant categories
Numbers in parentheses refer to discount: Numbers in parentheses refer to discounts for 8th BCSMIF participants
Undergraduate students are exempt from f: Undergraduate students are exempt from fees for all events
Graduate students are exempt from worksh: Graduate students are exempt from workshop fees
International participants will receive: International participants will receive an invoice with payment details
Invoice will be sent to your registered: Invoice will be sent to your registered email address after registration
Workshop registration fees vary by parti: Workshop registration fees vary by participant category. Check the fees page for complete information.
Get detailed information, program schedu: Get detailed information, program schedule, and speaker profiles
ABE membership status will be verified d: ABE membership status will be verified during registration
Transfer the registration amount to the: Transfer the registration amount to the bank account above using bank transfer or PIX.
Make sure to include your full name and: Make sure to include your full name and registration email in the payment reference.
After making payment, access your accoun: After making payment, access your account and upload the payment proof through your dashboard.
Your registration status will be updated: Your registration status will be updated to "Confirmed" once our team processes your payment proof.
Register for the events through our regi: Register for the events through our registration system with your international details.
Follow the payment instructions in the i: Follow the payment instructions in the invoice for international wire transfer or credit card payment.
Invoices are typically sent within 24-48: Invoices are typically sent within 24-48 hours after registration completion.
Check registration fees or contact our s: Check registration fees or contact our support team for assistance

To register for the conference and works: To register for the conference and workshops, you must login first using your USP credentials or create an account.
To register for the 8th BCSMIF and satel: To register for the 8th BCSMIF and satellite workshops, you must first login with your USP credentials (Senha Única) or create a new account. This ensures secure access to your registration information and payment status.
Events You Currently Have Paid Access To: Events You Currently Have Paid Access To (PERMANENT)
These events are paid and permanent. No: These events are paid and permanent. No refunds or cancellations are allowed once payment is confirmed.
Once payment is confirmed, events become: Once payment is confirmed, events become permanent and non-refundable. You cannot cancel or modify paid events. Only additional events can be added.
All paid events are permanent and non-re: All paid events are permanent and non-refundable. Once payment is confirmed, events cannot be cancelled or modified.
Some events are already paid and cannot: Some events are already paid and cannot be modified. Paid events are non-refundable.
Your paid events are pre-selected below: Your paid events are pre-selected below and cannot be unchecked. They are permanent and non-refundable.
Please select at least one new event to: Please select at least one new event to add.
Your current events are pre-selected bel: Your current events are pre-selected below and cannot be unchecked. Select additional events you want to add.
Upload proof only for the amount still o: Upload proof only for the amount still owed above. Do not pay for events already paid.
